verses.verse: This <S%G3778><s%> is the third <S%G5154><s%> time <S%G5154><s%> I am coming <S%G2064><s%> to you. Every <S%G3956><s%> fact <S%G4487><s%> is to be confirmed <S%G2476><s%> by the testimony <S%G4750><s%> of two <S%G1417><s%> or <S%G2532><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> witnesses. <S%G3144><s%>

I have previously <S%G4275><s%> said <S%G4275><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> present <S%G3918><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> time, <S%G1208><s%> and though now <S%G3568><s%> absent <S%G548><s%> I say <S%G4302><s%> in advance <S%G4302><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who have sinned <S%G4258><s%> in the past <S%G4258><s%> and to all <S%G3956><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> as well, that if <S%G1437><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> I will not spare <S%G5339><s%> [anyone,]

since <S%G1893><s%> you are seeking <S%G2212><s%> for proof <S%G1382><s%> of the Christ <S%G5547><s%> who speaks <S%G2980><s%> in me, and who <S%G3739><s%> is not weak <S%G770><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you, but mighty <S%G1414><s%> in you.

For indeed <S%G2532><s%> He was crucified <S%G4717><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of weakness, <S%G769><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> He lives <S%G2198><s%> because <S%G1537><s%> of the power <S%G1411><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> For we also <S%G2532><s%> are weak <S%G770><s%> in Him, yet <S%G235><s%> we shall live <S%G2198><s%> with Him because <S%G1537><s%> of the power <S%G1411><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> [directed] toward <S%G1519><s%> you.

Test <S%G3985><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%> [to see] if <S%G1487><s%> you are in the faith; <S%G4102><s%> examine <S%G1381><s%> yourselves! <S%G1438><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> do you not recognize <S%G1921><s%> this about yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> is in you â€“ unless <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3385><s%> indeed you fail <S%G96><s%> the test <S%G96><s%>?
But I trust <S%G1679><s%> that you will realize <S%G1097><s%> that we ourselves <S%G1473><s%> do <S%G1510><s%> not fail <S%G96><s%> the test. <S%G96><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> we pray <S%G2172><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> that you do <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> wrong; <S%G2556><s%> not that we ourselves <S%G1473><s%> may appear <S%G5316><s%> approved, <S%G1384><s%> but that you may do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G2570><s%> is right, <S%G2570><s%> even <S%G1161><s%> though <S%G5613><s%> we should appear <S%G1510><s%> <S%G5613><s%> unapproved. <S%G96><s%>
For we can <S%G1410><s%> do nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the truth, <S%G225><s%> but [only] for the truth. <S%G225><s%>

For we rejoice <S%G5463><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> we ourselves <S%G1473><s%> are weak <S%G770><s%> but you are strong; <S%G1415><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> we also <S%G2532><s%> pray <S%G2172><s%> for, that you be made <S%G2676><s%> complete. <S%G2676><s%>

For this <S%G3778><s%> reason <S%G1223><s%> I am writing <S%G1125><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> while absent, <S%G548><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that when present <S%G3918><s%> I may not use <S%G5530><s%> severity, <S%G664><s%> in accordance <S%G2596><s%> with the authority <S%G1849><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> me, for building <S%G3619><s%> up and not for tearing <S%G2506><s%> down. <S%G2506><s%>

Finally, <S%G3062><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> be made <S%G2675><s%> complete, <S%G2675><s%> be comforted, <S%G3870><s%> be like-minded, live <S%G1514><s%> in peace; <S%G1514><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of love <S%G26><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> shall be with you.
Greet <S%G782><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> with a holy <S%G40><s%> kiss. <S%G5370><s%>

The grace <S%G5485><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and the fellowship <S%G2842><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> be with you all. <S%G3956><s%>
